app_name: 통화 강도 측정기 Forex 거래 도구 거래자
app_detail:
Currency Exchange Forex trading Strength Meter
Currency Heatwave forex trading tools is a financial markets app that focuses on the forex traders tools and parameters that are important for trading as much as the basic movement of the Forex Exchange Instruments itself. These complex parameters are simplified in a graphical format to help traders in split decision making on buying or selling currencies.

The app has 5 screens covering 4 important aspects of trading that is Currency Strength, Volume, Volatility and Sentiment.
